title: Create a node pool for UD/UCMDB
content:
To create a NODE POOL for UD/UCMDB, follow these steps:

  1. Log in to the Google Cloud Platform Console at https://console.cloud.google.com/.

  2. From the left navigation bar, select CLUSTER > select your cluster > NODES > ADD NODE POOL, and populate the following fields:

    Make sure you define one Kubernetes label: worker: ucmdb.

For details about the number of nodes, see Sizing on GCP.
